original: Gorakṣa-śatakam
analyzed: gorakṣaśatakam

original: oṃ parama-gurave gorakṣanāthāya namaḥ
analyzed: om parama gurave gorakṣa nāthāya namaḥ

original: oṃ gorakṣa-śatakaṃ vakṣye bhava-pāśa-vimuktaye /
analyzed: om gorakṣaśatakam vakṣye bhava pāśa vimuktaye

original: ātma-bodha-karaṃ puṃsāṃ viveka-dvāra-kuñcikām // GorS(1)_1 //
analyzed: ātma bodha karam puṃsām viveka dvāra kuñcikām

original: etad vimukti-sopānam etat kālasya vañcanam /
analyzed: etat vimukti sopānam etat kālasya vañcanam

original: yad vyāvṛttaṃ mano mohād āsaktaṃ paramātmani // GorS(1)_2 //
analyzed: yat vyāvṛttam manaḥ mohāt āsaktam paramātmani

original: dvija-sevita-śākhasya śruti-kalpa-taroḥ phalam /
analyzed: dvija sevita śākhasya śruti kalpataroḥ phalam

original: śamanaṃ bhava-tāpasya yogaṃ bhajati sajjanaḥ // GorS(1)_3 //
analyzed: śamanam bhava tāpasya yogam bhajati sat janaḥ

original: āsanaṃ prāṇa-saṃyāmaḥ pratyāhāro'tha dhāraṇā /
analyzed: āsanam prāṇasaṃyāmaḥ pratyāhāraḥ utha dhāraṇā

original: dhyānaṃ samādhir etāni yogāṅgāni bhavanti ṣaṭ // GorS(1)_4 //
analyzed: dhyānam samādhiḥ etāni yoga aṅgāni bhavanti ṣaḍ

original: āsanāni tu tāvanti yāvatyo jīva-jātayaḥ /
analyzed: āsanāni tu tāvanti yāvatyaḥ jīva jātayaḥ

original: eteṣām akhilān bhedān vijānāti maheśvaraḥ // GorS(1)_5 //
analyzed: eteṣām akhilān bhedān vijānāti maheśvaraḥ

original: caturāśīti-lakṣāṇāṃ ekam ekam udāhṛtam /
analyzed: catura aśīti lakṣāṇām ekam ekam udāhṛtam

original: tataḥ śivena pīṭhānāṃ ṣoḍeśānaṃ śataṃ kṛtam // GorS(1)_6 //
analyzed: tatas śivena pīṭhānām ṣoḍaśa īśānam śatam kṛtam

original: āsanebhyaḥ samastebhyo dvayam eva viśiṣyate /
analyzed: āsanebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ dvayam eva viśiṣyate

original: ekaṃ siddhāsanaṃ proktaṃ dvitīyaṃ kamalāsanam // GorS(1)_7 //
analyzed: ekam siddhāsanam proktam dvitīyam kamalāsanam

original: yoni-sthānakam aṅghri-mūla-ghaṭitaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ vinyasen meḍhre pādam athaikam eva niyataṃ kṛtvā samaṃ vigraham /
analyzed: yoni sthānakam aṅghri mūla ghaṭitam kṛtvā dṛḍham vinyaset meḍhre pādam athā ekam eva niyatam kṛtvā samam vigraham

original: sthāṇuḥ saṃyamitendriyo'cala-dṛśā paśyan bhruvor antaram etan mokṣa-kavāṭa-bheda-janakaṃ siddhāsanaṃ procyate // GorS(1)_8 //
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ saṃyamita indriya ucala dṛśā paśyan bhruvoḥ antaram etat mokṣa kavāṭa bheda janakam siddhāsanam procyate

original: vāmorūpari dakṣiṇaṃ hi caraṇaṃ saṃsthāpya vāmaṃ tathā dakṣorūpari paścimena vidhinā dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ dṛḍham /
analyzed: vāma ūru upari dakṣiṇam hi caraṇam saṃsthāpya vāmam tathā dakṣa ūru upari paścimena vidhinā dhṛtvā karābhyām dṛḍham

original: aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukaṃ nāsāgram ālokayed etad-vyādhi-vikāra-hāri yamināṃ padmāsanaṃ procyate // GorS(1)_9 //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukam nāsā agram ālokayet etat vyādhi vikāra hāri yaminām padmāsanam procyate

original: ādhāraḥ prathamaṃ cakraṃ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ dvitīyakam /
analyzed: ādhāraḥ prathamam cakram svādhiṣṭhānam dvitīyakam

original: yoni-sthānaṃ dvayor madhye kāma-rūpaṃ nigadyate // GorS(1)_10 //
analyzed: yoni sthānam dvayoḥ madhye kāmarūpam nigadyate

original: ādhārākhye guda-sthāne paṅkajaṃ yac caturdalam /
analyzed: ādhāra ākhye guda sthāne paṅkajam yat catur dalam

original: tan-madhye procyate yoniḥ kāmākhyā siddha-vanditā // GorS(1)_11 //
analyzed: tad madhye procyate yoniḥ kāma ākhyā siddha vanditā

original: yoni-madhye mahāliṅgaṃ paścimābhimukhaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: yoni madhye mahā liṅgam paścima abhimukham sthitam

original: mastake maṇivad bhinnaṃ yo jānāti sa yogavit // GorS(1)_12 //
analyzed: mastake maṇi vat bhinnam yaḥ jānāti sa yoga vid

original: tapta-cāmīkarābhāsaṃ taḍil-lekheva visphurat /
analyzed: tapta cāmīkara ābhāsam taḍit lekhā iva visphurat

original: caturasraṃ puraṃ vahner adho-meḍhram evābhidhīyate // GorS(1)_13 //
analyzed: catur asram puram vahneḥ adhas meḍhram eva abhidhīyate

original: sva-śabdena bhavet prāṇaḥ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ tad-āśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sva śabdena bhavet prāṇaḥ svādhiṣṭhānam tad āśrayaḥ

original: svādhiṣṭhānākhyayā tasmān meḍhram evābhidhīyate // GorS(1)_14 //
analyzed: svādhiṣṭhāna ākhyayā tasmāt meḍhram eva abhidhīyate

original: tantunā maṇivat proto yatra kandaḥ suṣumṇayā /
analyzed: tantunā maṇi vat protaḥ yatra kandaḥ suṣumṇayā

original: tan-nābhi-maṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ procyate maṇi-pūrakam // GorS(1)_15 //
analyzed: tad nābhi maṇḍalam cakram procyate maṇipūrakam

original: ūrdhvaṃ meḍhrād adho nābheḥ kanda-yoniḥ sva-gāṇḍavat /
analyzed: ūrdhvam meḍhrāt adhas nābheḥ kandayoniḥ sva gāṇḍa vat

original: tatra nāḍyaḥ samutpannāḥ sahasrāṇi dvisaptatiḥ // GorS(1)_16 //
analyzed: tatra nāḍyaḥ samutpannāḥ sahasrāṇi dvisaptatiḥ

original: teṣu nāḍi-sahasreṣu dvisaptatir udāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: teṣu nāḍi sahasreṣu dvisaptatiḥ udāhṛtāḥ

original: prādhānyāt prāṇa-vāhinyo bhūyas tatra daśa smṛtāḥ // GorS(1)_17 //
analyzed: prādhānyāt prāṇa vāhinyaḥ bhūyas tatra daśa smṛtāḥ

original: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /
analyzed: iḍā ca piṅgalā ca eva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā

original: gāndhārī hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā caiva yaśasvinī // GorS(1)_18 //
analyzed: gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā ca eva yaśasvinī

original: alambuṣā kuhūś caiva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā /
analyzed: alambuṣā kuhūḥ ca eva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā

original: etan nāḍi-mayaṃ cakraṃ jñātavyaṃ yogibhiḥ sadā // GorS(1)_19 //
analyzed: etat nāḍi mayam cakram jñātavyam yogibhiḥ sadā

original: iḍā vāme sthitā bhāge piṅgalā dakṣiṇe tathā /
analyzed: iḍā vāme sthitā bhāge piṅgalā dakṣiṇe tathā

original: suṣumṇā madhya-deśe tu gāndhārī vāma-cakṣuṣi // GorS(1)_20 //
analyzed: suṣumṇā madhya deśe tu gāndhārī vāma cakṣuṣi

original: dakṣiṇe hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā karṇe ca dakṣiṇe /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe hasti jihvā ca pūṣā karṇe ca dakṣiṇe

original: yaśasvinī vāma-karṇe cāsane vāpy alambuṣā // GorS(1)_21 //
analyzed: yaśasvinī vāma karṇe ca āsane vā api alambuṣā

original: kūhuś ca liṅga-deśe tu mūla-sthāne ca śaṅkhinī /
analyzed: kūhuḥ ca liṅga deśe tu mūlasthāne ca śaṅkhinī

original: evaṃ dvāram upāśritya tiṣṭhanti daśa nāḍikāḥ // GorS(1)_22 //
analyzed: evam dvāram upāśritya tiṣṭhanti daśa nāḍikāḥ

original: satataṃ prāṇa-vāhinyaḥ soma-sūryāgni-devatāḥ /
analyzed: satatam prāṇa vāhinyaḥ soma sūrya agni devatāḥ

original: iḍā-piṅgalā-suṣumṇā ca tisro nāḍya udāhṛtāḥ // GorS(1)_23 //
analyzed: iḍā piṅgalā suṣumṇā ca tisraḥ nāḍyaḥ udāhṛtāḥ

original: prāṇāpānau samānaś ca hy udāno vyāna eva ca /
analyzed: prāṇa apānau samānaḥ ca hi udānaḥ vyānaḥ eva ca

original: nāgaḥ kūrmaś ca kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GorS(1)_24 //
analyzed: nāgaḥ kūrmaḥ ca kṛkaraḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ

original: nāgādyāḥ pañca vikhyātāḥ prāṇādyāḥ pañca vāyavaḥ /
analyzed: nāga ādyāḥ pañca vikhyātāḥ prāṇa ādyāḥ pañca vāyavaḥ

original: ete nāḍi-sahasreṣu vartante jīva-rūpiṇaḥ // GorS(1)_25 //
analyzed: ete nāḍi sahasreṣu vartante jīva rūpiṇaḥ

original: prāṇāpāna-vaśo jīvo hy adhaś cordhvaṃ ca dhāvati /
analyzed: prāṇa apāna vaśaḥ jīvaḥ hi adhas ca ūrdhvam ca dhāvati

original: vāma-dakṣiṇa-mārgeṇa cañcalatvān na dṛśyate // GorS(1)_26 //
analyzed: vāma dakṣiṇa mārgeṇa cañcala tvāt na dṛśyate

original: ākṣipto bhuvi daṇḍena yathoccalati kandukaḥ /
analyzed: ākṣiptaḥ bhuvi daṇḍena yathā uccalati kandukaḥ

original: prāṇāpāna-samākṣiptas tathā jīvo'nukṛṣyate // GorS(1)_27 //
analyzed: prāṇa apāna samākṣiptaḥ tathā jīvaḥ anukṛṣyate

original: rajju-baddho yathā śyeno gato'py ākṛṣyate(?) /
analyzed: rajju baddhaḥ yathā śyenaḥ gataḥ upi ākṛṣyate

original: guṇa-baddhas tathā jīvaḥ prāṇāpānena kṛṣyate // GorS(1)_28 //
analyzed: guṇa baddhaḥ tathā jīvaḥ prāṇa apānena kṛṣyate

original: apānaḥ karṣati prāṇaḥ prāṇo'pānaṃ ca karṣati /
analyzed: apānaḥ karṣati prāṇaḥ prāṇa upānam ca karṣati

original: ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitāv etau yo jānāti sa yogavit // GorS(1)_29 //
analyzed: ūrdhva adhas saṃsthitau etau yaḥ jānāti sa yoga vid

original: kandordhve kuṇḍalī-śaktir aṣṭadhā kuṇḍalī-kṛtā /
analyzed: kanda ūrdhve kuṇḍalī śaktiḥ aṣṭadhā kuṇḍalī kṛtā

original: brahma-dvāra-mukhaṃ nityaṃ mukhenāvṛtya tiṣṭhati // GorS(1)_30 //
analyzed: brahmadvāra mukham nityam mukhena āvṛtya tiṣṭhati

original: prabuddhā vahni-yogena manasā mārutā hatā /
analyzed: prabuddhā vahni yogena manasā mārutā hatā

original: prajīva-guṇam ādāya vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ suṣumṇayā // GorS(1)_31 //
analyzed: prajīva guṇam ādāya vrajati ūrdhvam suṣumṇayā

original: mahāmudrāṃ namo-mudrām uḍḍiyānaṃ jalandharam /
analyzed: mahāmudrām namaḥ mudrām uḍḍiyānam jalandharam

original: mūla-bandhaṃ ca yo vetti sa yogī siddhi-bhājanam // GorS(1)_32 //
analyzed: mūlabandham ca yaḥ vetti sa yogī siddhi bhājanam

original: vakṣo-nyasta-hanur nipīḍya suciraṃ yoniṃ ca vāmāṅghriṇā hastābhyām avadhāritaṃ prasaritaṃ pādaṃ tathā dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: vakṣaḥ nyasta hanuḥ nipīḍya su ciram yonim ca vāma aṅghriṇā hastābhyām avadhāritam prasaritam pādam tathā dakṣiṇam

original: āpūrya śvasanena kukṣi-yugalaṃ baddhvā śanai recayed eṣā pātaka-nāśinī sumahatī mudrā nṝṇāṃ procyate // GorS(1)_33 //
analyzed: āpūrya śvasanena kukṣi yugalam baddhvā śanais recayet eṣā pātaka nāśinī su mahatī mudrā nṝṇām procyate

original: kapāla-kuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā /
analyzed: kapāla kuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparīta gā

original: bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī // GorS(1)_34 //
analyzed: bhruvoḥ antargatā dṛṣṭiḥ mudrā bhavati khecarī

original: ūrdhvaṃ meḍhrād adho nābher uḍḍiyānaṃ pracakṣate /
analyzed: ūrdhvam meḍhrāt adhas nābheḥ uḍḍiyānam pracakṣate

original: uḍḍiyāna-jayo bandho mṛtyu-mātaṅga-kesarī // GorS(1)_35 //
jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭha-saṅkoca-lakṣaṇe /
analyzed: jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭha saṅkoca lakṣaṇe

original: na pīyūṣaṃ pataty agnau na ca vāyuḥ prakupyati // GorS(1)_36 //
analyzed: na pīyūṣam patati agnau na ca vāyuḥ prakupyati

original: pārṣṇi-bhāgena sampīḍya yonim ākuñcayed gudam /
analyzed: pārṣṇi bhāgena sampīḍya yonim ākuñcayet gudam

original: apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūla-bandho nigadyate // GorS(1)_37 //
analyzed: apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandhaḥ nigadyate

original: yataḥ kāla-bhayāt brahmā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yatas kāla bhayāt brahmā prāṇāyāma parāyaṇaḥ

original: yogino munayaś caiva tataḥ prāṇaṃ nibandhayet // GorS(1)_38 //
analyzed: yoginaḥ munayaḥ ca eva tatas prāṇam nibandhayet

original: cale vāte calaṃ sarvaṃ niścale niścalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: cale vāte calam sarvam niścale niścalam bhavet

original: yogī sthāṇutvam āpnoti tato vāyuṃ nibandhayet // GorS(1)_39 //
analyzed: yogī sthāṇu tvam āpnoti tatas vāyum nibandhayet

original: ṣaṭ-triṃśad-aṅgulaṃ haṃsaḥ prayāṇaṃ kurute bahiḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat aṅgulam haṃsaḥ prayāṇam kurute bahis

original: vāma-dakṣiṇa-mārgeṇa tataḥ prāṇo'bhidhīyate // GorS(1)_40 //
analyzed: vāma dakṣiṇa mārgeṇa tatas prāṇaḥ abhidhīyate

original: baddha-padmāsano yogī namaskṛtya guruṃ śivam /
analyzed: baddha padmāsanaḥ yogī namaskṛtya gurum śivam

original: nāsāgra-dṛṣṭir ekākī prāṇāyāmaṃ samabhyaset // GorS(1)_41 //
analyzed: nāsā agra dṛṣṭiḥ ekākī prāṇāyāmam samabhyaset

original: prāṇo deha-sthito vāyur āyāmas tan-nibandhanam /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ deha sthitaḥ vāyuḥ āyāmaḥ tad nibandhanam

original: eka-śvāsa-mayī mātrā tad yogī gaganāyate // GorS(1)_42 //
analyzed: eka śvāsa mayī mātrā tat yogī gaganāyate

original: baddha-padmāsano yogī prāṇaṃ candreṇa pūrayet /
analyzed: baddha padmāsanaḥ yogī prāṇam candreṇa pūrayet

original: dhārayitvā yathā-śakti bhūyaḥ sūryeṇa recayet // GorS(1)_43 //
analyzed: dhārayitvā yathāśakti bhūyas sūryeṇa recayet

original: amṛtodadhi-saṅkāśaṃ kṣīroda-dhavala-prabham /
analyzed: amṛta udadhi saṅkāśam kṣīroda dhavala prabham

original: dhyātvā candramayaṃ bimbaṃ prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet // GorS(1)_44 //
analyzed: dhyātvā candra mayam bimbam prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet

original: prāṇaṃ sūryeṇa cākṛṣya pūrayed udaraṃ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: prāṇam sūryeṇa ca ākṛṣya pūrayet udaram śanais

original: kumbhayitvā vidhānena bhūyaś candreṇa recayet // GorS(1)_45 //
analyzed: kumbhayitvā vidhānena bhūyas candreṇa recayet

original: prajvalaj-jvalana-jvālā- puñjam āditya-maṇḍalam /
analyzed: prajvalat jvalana jvālā puñjam āditya maṇḍalam

original: dhyātvā nābhi-sthitaṃ yogī prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet // GorS(1)_46 //
analyzed: dhyātvā nābhi sthitam yogī prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet

original: recakaḥ pūrakaś caiva kumbhakaḥ praṇavātmakaḥ /
analyzed: recakaḥ pūrakaḥ ca eva kumbhakaḥ praṇava ātmakaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmo bhavet tredhā mātrā dvādaśa-saṃyutaḥ // GorS(1)_47 //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaḥ bhavet tredhā mātrāḥ dvādaśa saṃyutaḥ

original: dvādaśādhamake mātrā madhyame dviguṇās tataḥ /
analyzed: dvādaśa adhamake mātrāḥ madhyame dviguṇāḥ tatas

original: uttame triguṇā mātrāḥ prāṇāyāmasya nirṇayaḥ // GorS(1)_48 //
analyzed: uttame triguṇāḥ mātrāḥ prāṇāyāmasya nirṇayaḥ

original: adhame ca ghano gharmaḥ kampo bhavati madhyame /
analyzed: adhame ca ghanaḥ gharmaḥ kampaḥ bhavati madhyame

original: uttiṣṭhaty uttame yogī baddha-padmāsano muhuḥ // GorS(1)_49 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭhati uttame yogī baddha padmāsanaḥ muhur

original: aṅgānāṃ mardanaṃ śastaṃ śrama-saṃjāta-vāriṇā /
analyzed: aṅgānām mardanam śastam śrama saṃjāta vāriṇā

original: kaṭv-amla-lavaṇa-tyāgī kṣīra-bhojanam ācaret // GorS(1)_50 //
analyzed: kaṭu amla lavaṇa tyāgī kṣīra bhojanam ācaret

original: mandaṃ mandaṃ pibed vāyuṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ viyojayet /
analyzed: mandam mandam pibet vāyum mandam mandam viyojayet

original: nādhikaṃ stambhayed vāyuṃ na ca śīghraṃ vimocayet // GorS(1)_51 //
analyzed: na adhikam stambhayet vāyum na ca śīghram vimocayet

original: ūrdhvam ākṛṣya cāpānaṃ vātaṃ prāṇe niyojayet /
analyzed: ūrdhvam ākṛṣya ca apānam vātam prāṇe niyojayet

original: mūrdhānaṃ nīyate śaktyā sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GorS(1)_52 //
analyzed: mūrdhānam nīyate śaktyā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: prāṇāyāmo bhavaty evaṃ pātakendhana-pātakaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaḥ bhavati evam pātaka indhana pātakaḥ

original: enombudhi-mahā-setuḥ procyate yogibhiḥ sadā // GorS(1)_53 //
analyzed: enaḥ umbudhi mahā setuḥ procyate yogibhiḥ sadā

original: āsanena rujo hanti prāṇāyāmena pātakam /
analyzed: āsanena rujaḥ hanti prāṇāyāmena pātakam

original: vikāraṃ mānasaṃ yogī pratyāhāreṇa sarvadā // GorS(1)_54 //
analyzed: vikāram mānasam yogī pratyāhāreṇa sarvadā

original: candrāmṛta-mayīṃ dhārāṃ pratyāhārati bhāskaraḥ /
analyzed: candra amṛta mayīm dhārām bhāskaraḥ

original: tat-pratyāharaṇaṃ tasya pratyāhāraḥ sa ucyate // GorS(1)_55 //
analyzed: tat pratyāharaṇam tasya pratyāhāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: ekā strī bhujyate dvābhyām āgatā soma-maṇḍalāt /
analyzed: ekā strī bhujyate dvābhyām āgatā soma maṇḍalāt

original: tṛtīyo yo bhavet tābhyāṃ sa bhavaty ajarāmaraḥ // GorS(1)_56 //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ yaḥ bhavet tābhyām sa bhavati ajara amaraḥ

original: nābhideśe bhavaty eko bhāskaro dahanātmakaḥ /
analyzed: nābhi deśe bhavati ekaḥ bhāskaraḥ dahana ātmakaḥ

original: amṛtātmā sthito nityaṃ tālumūle ca candramāḥ // GorS(1)_57 //
analyzed: amṛta ātmā sthitaḥ nityam tālu mūle ca candramāḥ

original: varṣaty adhomukhaś candro grasaty ūrdhva-mukho raviḥ /
analyzed: varṣati adhomukhaḥ candraḥ grasati ūrdhva mukhaḥ raviḥ

original: jñātavyaṃ karaṇaṃ tatra yena pīyūṣam āpyate // GorS(1)_58 //
analyzed: jñātavyam karaṇam tatra yena pīyūṣam āpyate

original: ūrdhva-nābhir adhas tālu ūrdhva-bhānur adhaḥ śaśī /
analyzed: ūrdhva nābhiḥ adhas tālu ūrdhva bhānuḥ adhas śaśī

original: karaṇaṃ viparītākhyaṃ guru-vaktreṇa labhyate // GorS(1)_59 //
analyzed: karaṇam viparīta ākhyam guru vaktreṇa labhyate

original: tridhā baddho vṛṣo yatra rauravīti mahāsvanam /
analyzed: tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣaḥ yatra rauravīti mahā svanam

original: anāhataṃ ca tac cakraṃ hṛdaye yogino viduḥ // GorS(1)_60 //
analyzed: anāhatam ca tat cakram hṛdaye yoginaḥ viduḥ

original: anāhatam atikramya cākramya maṇipūrakam /
analyzed: anāhatam atikramya ca ākramya maṇipūrakam

original: prāpte prāṇaṃ mahāpadmaṃ yogitvam amṛtāyate // GorS(1)_61 //
analyzed: prāpte prāṇam mahāpadmam yogi tvam amṛtāyate

original: viśabdaḥ saṃsmṛto haṃso nirmalaḥ śuddha ucyate /
analyzed: viśabdaḥ saṃsmṛtaḥ haṃsaḥ nirmalaḥ śuddhaḥ ucyate

original: ataḥ kaṇṭhe viśuddhākhye cakraṃ cakra-vido viduḥ // GorS(1)_62 //
analyzed: atas kaṇṭhe viśuddha ākhye cakram cakra vidaḥ viduḥ

original: viśuddhe parame cakre dhṛtvā soma-kalā-jalam /
analyzed: viśuddhe parame cakre dhṛtvā soma kalā jalam

original: māsena na kṣayaṃ yāti vañcayitvā mukhaṃ raveḥ // GorS(1)_63 //
analyzed: māsena na kṣayam yāti vañcayitvā mukham raveḥ

original: sampīḍya rasanāgreṇa rāja-danta-bilaṃ mahat /
analyzed: sampīḍya rasana agreṇa rājadanta bilam mahat

original: dhyātvāmṛtamayīṃ devīṃ ṣaṇ-māsena kavir bhavet // GorS(1)_64 //
analyzed: dhyātvā amṛta mayīm devīm ṣaṣ māsena kaviḥ bhavet

original: amṛtāpūrṇa-dehasya yogino dvi-tri-vatsarāt /
analyzed: amṛta āpūrṇa dehasya yoginaḥ dvi tri vatsarāt

original: ūrdhvaṃ pravartate reto'py aṇimādi-guṇodayaḥ // GorS(1)_65 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam pravartate retaḥ api aṇima ādi guṇa udayaḥ

original: indhanāni yathā vahnis taila-varti ca dīpakaḥ /
analyzed: indhanāni yathā vahniḥ taila varti ca dīpakaḥ

original: tathā somakalā-pūrṇaṃ dehī dehaṃ na muñcati // GorS(1)_66 //
analyzed: tathā soma kalā pūrṇam dehī deham na muñcati

original: āsanena samāyuktaḥ prāṇāyāmena saṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: āsanena samāyuktaḥ prāṇāyāmena saṃyutaḥ

original: pratyāhāreṇa saṃyukto dhāraṇāṃ ca samabhyaset // GorS(1)_67 //
analyzed: pratyāhāreṇa saṃyuktaḥ dhāraṇām ca samabhyaset

original: hṛdaye pañca-bhūtānāṃ dhāraṇāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: hṛdaye pañcabhūtānām dhāraṇām ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: manaso niścalatvena dhāraṇā ca vidhīyate // GorS(1)_68 //
analyzed: manasaḥ niścala tvena dhāraṇā ca vidhīyate

original: yā pṛthvī hari-tāla-deśa-rucirā pītā lakārānvitā saṃyuktā kamalāsanena hi catuṣkoṇā hṛdi sthāyinī /
analyzed: yā pṛthvī haritāla deśa rucirā pītā lakāra anvitā saṃyuktā kamalāsanena hi catuṣkoṇā hṛdi sthāyinī

original: prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañca-ghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā stambhakarī sadā kṣitijayaṃ kuryād bhuvo dhāraṇā // GorS(1)_69 //
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet eṣā stambha karī sadā kṣiti jayam kuryāt bhuvaḥ dhāraṇā

original: ardhendu-pratimaṃ ca kunda-dhavalaṃ kaṇṭhe'mbu-tattavṃ sthitaṃ yat pīyūṣa-va-kāra-bīja-sahitaṃ yuktaṃ sadā viṣṇunā /
analyzed: ardha indu pratimam ca kunda dhavalam sthitam yat pīyūṣa vakāra bīja sahitam yuktam sadā viṣṇunā

original: prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañca-ghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā durvaha-kāla-kūṭa-jaraṇā syād vāriṇī dhāraṇā // GorS(1)_70 //
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet eṣā durvaha kālakūṭa jaraṇā syāt vāriṇī dhāraṇā

original: yat tāla-sthitam indra-gopa-sadṛśaṃ tattvaṃ trikoṇojjvalaṃ tejo-repha-mayaṃ pravāla-ruciraṃ rudreṇa yat saṅgatam /
analyzed: yat tāla sthitam indragopa sadṛśam tattvam trikoṇa ujjvalam tejaḥ repha mayam pravāla ruciram rudreṇa yat

original: prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañca-ghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā vahni-jayaṃ sadā vidadhate vaiśvānarī dhāraṇā // GorS(1)_71 //
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet eṣā vahni jayam sadā vidadhate vaiśvānarī dhāraṇā

original: yad bhinnāñjana-puñja-sānnibham idaṃ tattvaṃ bhruvor antare vṛttaṃ vāyumayaṃ ya-kāra-sahitaṃ yatreśvaro devatā /
analyzed: yat bhinnāñjana puñja sānnibham idam tattvam bhruvoḥ antare vṛttam vāyu mayam yakāra sahitam yatra īśvaraḥ devatā

original: prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañca-ghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā khe gamanaṃ karoti yamināṃ syād vāyavī dhāraṇā // GorS(1)_72 //
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet eṣā khe gamanam karoti yaminām syāt vāyavī dhāraṇā

original: ākāśaṃ suviśuddha-vāri-sadṛśaṃ yad brahma-randhre sthitaṃ tatrādyena sadā-śivena sahitaṃ śāntaṃ ha-kārākṣaram /
analyzed: ākāśam su viśuddha vāri sadṛśam yat brahmarandhre sthitam tatra ādyena sadāśivena sahitam śāntam hakāra akṣaram

original: prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañca-ghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā mokṣa-kavāṭa-pāṭana-paṭuḥ proktā nabho-dhāraṇā // GorS(1)_73 //
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet eṣā mokṣa kavāṭa pāṭana paṭuḥ proktā nabhodhāraṇā

original: stambhanī drāvaṇī caiva dahanī bhrāmaṇī tathā /
analyzed: stambhanī drāvaṇī ca eva dahanī bhrāmaṇī tathā

original: śoṣaṇī ca bhavanty evaṃ bhūtānāṃ pañca dhāraṇāḥ // GorS(1)_74 //
analyzed: śoṣaṇī ca bhavanti evam bhūtānām pañca dhāraṇāḥ

original: karmaṇā manasā vācā dhāraṇāḥ pañca durlabhāḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā dhāraṇāḥ pañca durlabhāḥ

original: vidhāya satataṃ yogī sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GorS(1)_75 //
analyzed: vidhāya satatam yogī sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: sarvaṃ cintā-samāvarti yogino hṛdi vartate /
analyzed: sarvam cintā samāvarti yoginaḥ hṛdi vartate

original: yat tattve niścitaṃ cetas tat tu dhyānaṃ pracakṣate // GorS(1)_76 //
analyzed: yat tattve niścitam cetaḥ tat tu dhyānam pracakṣate

original: dvidhā bhavati tad dhyānaṃ sa-guṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: dvidhā bhavati tat dhyānam sa guṇam nirguṇam tathā

original: saguṇaṃ varṇa-bhedena nirguṇaṃ kevalaṃ viduḥ // GorS(1)_77 //
analyzed: sa guṇam varṇa bhedena nirguṇam kevalam viduḥ

original: ādhāraṃ prathamaṃ cakraṃ tapta-kāñcana-sannibham /
analyzed: ādhāram prathamam cakram tapta kāñcana sannibham

original: nāsāgre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā muñcati kilbiṣam // GorS(1)_78 //
analyzed: nāsā agre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā muñcati kilbiṣam

original: svādhiṣṭhānaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu san-māṇikya-suśobhanam /
analyzed: svādhiṣṭhānam dvitīyam tu sat māṇikya su śobhanam

original: nāsāgre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā muñcati pātakam // GorS(1)_79 //
analyzed: nāsā agre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā muñcati pātakam

original: taruṇāditya-saṃkāśaṃ cakraṃ ca maṇipūrakam /
analyzed: taruṇa āditya saṃkāśam cakram ca maṇipūrakam

original: nāsāgre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā saṃkṣobhayej jagat // GorS(1)_80 //
analyzed: nāsā agre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā saṃkṣobhayet jagat

original: [verse missing]
analyzed: verse missing

original: vidyut-prabhāvaṃ hṛt-padme prāṇāyāma-vibhedanaiḥ /
analyzed: vidyut prabhāvam hṛd padme prāṇāyāma vibhedanaiḥ

original: nāsāgre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā brahma-mayo bhavet // GorS(1)_82 //
analyzed: nāsā agre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā brahma mayaḥ bhavet

original: santataṃ ghaṇṭikā-madhye viśuddhaṃ cāmṛtodbhavam /
analyzed: santatam ghaṇṭikā madhye viśuddham ca amṛta udbhavam

original: nāsāgre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā brahma-mayo bhavet // GorS(1)_83 //
analyzed: nāsā agre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā brahma mayaḥ bhavet

original: bhruvor madhye sthitaṃ devaṃ snigdha-mauktika-sannibham /
analyzed: bhruvoḥ madhye sthitam devam snigdha mauktika sannibham

original: nāsāgre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā'nandamayo bhavet // GorS(1)_84 //
analyzed: nāsā agre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā ānanda mayaḥ bhavet

original: nirguṇaṃ ca śivaṃ śāntaṃ gagane viśvatomukham /
analyzed: nirguṇam ca śivam śāntam gagane viśvatomukham

original: nāsāgre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā duḥkhād vimucyate // GorS(1)_85 //
analyzed: nāsā agre dṛṣṭim ādāya dhyātvā duḥkhāt vimucyate

original: gudaṃ meḍhraṃ ca nābhiṃ ca hṛt-padme ca tad-ūrdhvataḥ /
analyzed: gudam meḍhram ca nābhim ca hṛd padme ca tad ūrdhvatas

original: ghaṇṭikāṃ lampikā-sthānaṃ bhrū-madhye parameśvaram // GorS(1)_86 //
analyzed: ghaṇṭikām lampikā sthānam bhrū madhye parameśvaram

original: nirmalaṃ gaganākāraṃ marīci-jala-sannibham /
analyzed: nirmalam gagana ākāram marīci jala sannibham

original: ātmānaṃ sarvagaṃ dhyātvā yogī yogam avāpnuyāt // GorS(1)_87 //
analyzed: ātmānam sarvagam dhyātvā yogī yogam avāpnuyāt

original: kathitāni yathaitāni dhyāna-sthānāni yoginām /
analyzed: kathitāni yathā etāni dhyāna sthānāni yoginām

original: upādhi-tattva-yuktāni kurvanty aṣṭa-guṇodayam // GorS(1)_88 //
upādhiś ca tathā tattvaṃ dvayam evam udāhṛtam /
analyzed: upādhiḥ ca tathā tattvam dvayam evam udāhṛtam

original: upādhiḥ procyate varṇas tattvam ātmābhidhīyate // GorS(1)_89 //
analyzed: upādhiḥ procyate varṇaḥ tattvam ātmā abhidhīyate

original: upādhir anyathā-jñānaṃ tattvaṃ saṃsthitam anyathā /
analyzed: upādhiḥ anyathā jñānam tattvam saṃsthitam anyathā

original: samastopādhi-vidhvaṃsi sadābhyāsena yoginām // GorS(1)_90 //
ātma-varṇena bhedena dṛśyate sphāṭiko maṇiḥ /
analyzed: ātma varṇena bhedena dṛśyate sphāṭikaḥ maṇiḥ

original: mukto yaḥ śakti-bhedena so'yam ātmā praśasyate // GorS(1)_91 //
analyzed: muktaḥ yaḥ śakti bhedena saḥ ayam ātmā praśasyate

original: nirātaṅkaṃ nirālambaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ nirāśrayam /
analyzed: nirātaṅkam nirālambam niṣprapañcam nirāśrayam

original: nirāmayaṃ nirākāraṃ tattvaṃ tattvavido viduḥ // GorS(1)_92 //
analyzed: nirāmayam nirākāram tattvam tattva vidaḥ viduḥ

original: śabdādyāḥ pañca yā mātrā yāvat karṇādiṣu smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: śabda ādyāḥ pañca yāḥ mātrāḥ yāvat karṇa ādiṣu smṛtāḥ

original: tāvad eva smṛtaṃ dhyānaṃ tat-samādhir ataḥ param // GorS(1)_93 //
analyzed: tāvat eva smṛtam dhyānam tad samādhiḥ atas param

original: yadā saṃkṣīyate prāṇo mānasaṃ ca vilīyate /
analyzed: yadā saṃkṣīyate prāṇaḥ mānasam ca vilīyate

original: tadā sama-rasaikatvaṃ samādhir abhidhīyate // GorS(1)_94 //
analyzed: tadā samarasa eka tvam samādhiḥ abhidhīyate

original: [verse missing]
analyzed: verse missing

original: dhāraṇāḥ pañca-nāḍyas tu dhyānaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhi-nāḍikāḥ /
analyzed: dhāraṇāḥ pañca nāḍyaḥ tu dhyānam ca ṣaṣṭhi nāḍikāḥ

original: dina-dvādaśakenaiva samādhiḥ prāṇa-saṃyamaḥ // GorS(1)_96 //
analyzed: dina dvādaśakena eva samādhiḥ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ

original: na gandhaṃ na rasaṃ rūpaṃ na sparśaṃ na ca niḥsvanam /
analyzed: na gandham na rasam rūpam na sparśam na ca niḥsvanam

original: ātmānaṃ na paraṃ vetti yogī yuktaḥ samādhinā // GorS(1)_97 //
analyzed: ātmānam na param vetti yogī yuktaḥ samādhinā

original: khādyate na ca kālena bādhyate na ca karmaṇā /
analyzed: khādyate na ca kālena bādhyate na ca karmaṇā

original: sādhyate na ca kenāpi yogī yuktaḥ samādhinā // GorS(1)_98 //
analyzed: sādhyate na ca kena api yogī yuktaḥ samādhinā

original: nirmalaṃ niścalaṃ nityaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nirguṇaṃ mahat /
analyzed: nirmalam niścalam nityam niṣkriyam nirguṇam mahat

original: vyoma-vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma brahma-vido viduḥ // GorS(1)_99 //
analyzed: vyoma vijñānam ānandam brahma brahma vidaḥ viduḥ

original: dugdhe kṣīraṃ dhṛte sarpir agnau vahnir ivārpitaḥ /
analyzed: dugdhe kṣīram dhṛte sarpiḥ agnau vahniḥ iva arpitaḥ

original: advayatvaṃ vrajen nityaṃ yogavit parame pade // GorS(1)_100 //
analyzed: advaya tvam vrajet nityam yoga vid parame pade

original: bhava-bhaya-vane vahnir mukti-sopāna-mārgataḥ /
analyzed: bhava bhaya vane vahniḥ mukti sopāna mārgataḥ

original: advayatvaṃ vrajen nityaṃ yogavit parame pade // GorS(1)_101 //
analyzed: advaya tvam vrajet nityam yoga vid parame pade

original: gorakṣa-śatakaṃ samāptam
analyzed: gorakṣa śatakam samāptam
